radiographic_examinations.findings: 5 x 3.8 x 4.3-cm mass abutting the femoral neurovascular bundle in the adductor musculature of the proximal part of the right thigh, characterized by areas of subtle increased Tl signal and high T2 signal with heterogeneous enhancement.
2 x 1.7-cm nonspecific mass in the left lower lobe and several mediastinal lymph nodes, measuring <1 cm.
